PackageOracle.name: DA_PHONE_NUM
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PHONE_NUM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.07.957287000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,phone_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_country_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_area_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_exchange_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_line_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_extension_num IN VARCHAR2
,valid_telephone_num_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,phone_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_country_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_area_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_exchange_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_line_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_extension_num IN VARCHAR2
,valid_telephone_num_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,telephone_num_id IN NUMBER
,phone_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_country_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_area_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_exchange_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_line_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_extension_num IN VARCHAR2
,valid_telephone_num_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,telephone_num_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_phone_num;

body.name: DA_PHONE_NUM
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PHONE_NUM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.07.969781000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,phone_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_country_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_area_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_exchange_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_line_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_extension_num IN VARCHAR2
,valid_telephone_num_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_phone_num.add(fx), parms=' || phone_num || '|' || phone_country_code_num || '|' || phone_area_code_num || '|' || phone_exchange_num || '|' || phone_line_num || '|' || phone_extension_num || '|' || valid_telephone_num_ind || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_phone_num a
(
a.telephone_num_id
,a.phone_num
,a.phone_country_code_num
,a.phone_area_code_num
,a.phone_exchange_num
,a.phone_line_num
,a.phone_extension_num
,a.valid_telephone_num_ind
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_telephone_num_id.NEXTVAL
,add.phone_num
,add.phone_country_code_num
,add.phone_area_code_num
,add.phone_exchange_num
,add.phone_line_num
,add.phone_extension_num
,add.valid_telephone_num_ind
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.telephone_num_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_phone_num.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,phone_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_country_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_area_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_exchange_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_line_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_extension_num IN VARCHAR2
,valid_telephone_num_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_phone_num.add, parms=' || phone_num || '|' || phone_country_code_num || '|' || phone_area_code_num || '|' || phone_exchange_num || '|' || phone_line_num || '|' || phone_extension_num || '|' || valid_telephone_num_ind || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_phone_num a
(
a.telephone_num_id
,a.phone_num
,a.phone_country_code_num
,a.phone_area_code_num
,a.phone_exchange_num
,a.phone_line_num
,a.phone_extension_num
,a.valid_telephone_num_ind
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_telephone_num_id.NEXTVAL
,add.phone_num
,add.phone_country_code_num
,add.phone_area_code_num
,add.phone_exchange_num
,add.phone_line_num
,add.phone_extension_num
,add.valid_telephone_num_ind
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_phone_num.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,telephone_num_id IN NUMBER
,phone_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_country_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_area_code_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_exchange_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_line_num IN VARCHAR2
,phone_extension_num IN VARCHAR2
,valid_telephone_num_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_phone_num.add, parms=' || telephone_num_id || '|' || phone_num || '|' || phone_country_code_num || '|' || phone_area_code_num || '|' || phone_exchange_num || '|' || phone_line_num || '|' || phone_extension_num || '|' || valid_telephone_num_ind || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_phone_num a
(
a.telephone_num_id
,a.phone_num
,a.phone_country_code_num
,a.phone_area_code_num
,a.phone_exchange_num
,a.phone_line_num
,a.phone_extension_num
,a.valid_telephone_num_ind
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.telephone_num_id
,add.phone_num
,add.phone_country_code_num
,add.phone_area_code_num
,add.phone_exchange_num
,add.phone_line_num
,add.phone_extension_num
,add.valid_telephone_num_ind
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_phone_num.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,telephone_num_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_phone_num.del, parms=' || telephone_num_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_phone_num a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.telephone_num_id = del.telephone_num_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_phone_num.del');

END del;

END da_phone_num;
